医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
玛丽皇后科学家发明了一种修复骨软骨缺陷的新方法伦敦皇后大学的科学家发明了一种修复骨软骨缺陷的新方法 - 一种常见的关节损害形式，通常是由运动损伤或创伤造成的 - 并防止发展为骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/queen-mary-scientists-ind-scientists-ind-avent-a-new-way-way-way-way-repair-osteochochondral-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/queen-mary-scientists-ind-scientists-ind-avent-a-new-way-way-way-way-repair-osteochochondral-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2C2B2585-9754-4A24-9A24-9A3F-51D2FB23988B Tue, 01 Apr 2025 00:04:52 -0400 Queen Mary scientists invent a new way to repair osteochondral defects
世界首先批准trofolastat进行男性前列腺癌的诊断成像药物和医疗保健产品监管机构（MHRA）批准了Trofolastat（Rotecpsma），这是第一个前列腺特异性膜抗原（PSMA） - 靶向产品，旨在与Technetium-99M一起使用，以检测患有前列腺癌的男性癌性病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/world-first-first-as-mhra-approves-trofolastat-for-diarostic-imengnostic-imaging-imaging-imaging-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/world-first-first-first-as-mhra-approves-trofolastat-for-dinostic-imagnostic-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-protate-cancer-cancer-in-men-in-men-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc97cba2-fe04-4768-bffa-3209f972560b Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:51:00 -0400 World first as MHRA approves trofolastat for diagnostic imaging of prostate cancer in men
患者导航器增加后续结肠镜检查并减少延迟亚利桑那大学健康科学领导的一项研究发现，如果患者导航员通过整个过程帮助他们，则在异常的粪便测试后，患者更有可能在粪便测试异常后接受结肠镜检查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/patient-navigators-boost-follow-colonoscopies-and-colonoscopies-and-reduce-delays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/patient-navigators-boost-follow-colonoscopies-and-colonoscopies-and-reduce-delays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0035085e-a65e-43fb-8358-81C9DF0F9CC1 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:47:53 -0400 Patient navigators boost follow-up colonoscopies and reduce delays
所有ALS联盟都创建了一个中央信息枢纽，以加速ALS研究ALS（所有ALS）财团中所有人的访问宣布启动其官方网站，为有关其计划和临床研究的信息创建了中央枢纽。 All-Als.org旨在告知和吸引研究人员，临床医生以及当前和前瞻性的研究参与者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/all-als-consortium-coreates-a-central-information-nformation-hub-to-accelerate-als-alsearch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/all-als-consortium-coreates-a-central-information-nformation-nformation-hub-to-accelerate-als-alsearch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63A5C2B6-3E91-4C89-8460-4F007A07E3DA Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:40:23 -0400 ALL ALS Consortium creates a central information hub to accelerate ALS research
Tirzepatide改善了肾脏和HFPEF患者的肾脏，心血管功能根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的特色临床研究，该药物提高了肥胖和心力衰竭（HFPEF）的肥胖和心力衰竭（HFPEF）的患者的肾功能和心血管结局的改善，并在JACC中同时发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/tirzepatide-improves-kidney-cardney-cardiescular-function-incunction-in-patients-in-patients-with-obesity--obesity-and-hfpef.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/tirzepatide-improves-kidney-cardney-cardiescular-function-incunction-in-patients-in-patients-with-obesity-with-obesity-and-hfpef.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=182D53C4-8F39-418C-891D-3802829BBBB8 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:13:05 -0400 Tirzepatide improves kidney, cardiovascular function in patients with obesity and HFpEF
研究人员获得了270万美元的NIH赠款，以发展下一代合成血液失血是1至46岁的创伤患者死亡的主要原因，这主要是因为他们无法迅速获得安全的血液来源。可能的解决方案？冷冻干燥的合成血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/researchers-receive-2427.27亿nih-nih-nih-grant-to-to-to-develop-te-the-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-genter-synthethetic-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/researchers-receive-2427.27亿nih-nih-nih-grant-to-to-to-develop-the-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-of-synthethetic-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=938d594f-d9d2-d9d2-4f29-8f21-47a494b82959 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:07:36 -0400 Researchers receive $2.7 million NIH grant to develop the next generation of synthetic blood
长期的先验冥想证明可以改善压力和衰老标记Maharishi国际大学（MIU），Siegen大学和统一的健康科学服务大学的研究人员进行的一项合作研究表明，实践先验冥想（TM）技术的个人长期表现出良好的生物学标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/long-term-term-transcendental-meditation-shown-shown-shown-to-improve-sress-stress-and-aging-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/long-term-term-transcendental-meditation-meditation-shown-shown-to-improve-sress-and-aging-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f654efab-4462-462-4C22-B0D6-4C2E8AC325E0 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:00:11 -0400 Long-term Transcendental Meditation shown to improve stress and aging markers
研究有助于表征睡眠不足可能与阿尔茨海默氏症的发病机理有关新的研究表明，随着时间的流逝，特定睡眠阶段的比例较低与容易发生阿尔茨海默氏病的地区的大脑体积减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-helps-characterize-how-sleep-sleep-depeational-relate-to-relate-to-alzheimers-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-helps-characterize-how-sleep-deep-decipity-may-relate-to-to-to-alzheimers-parthopenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be9992E8-0428-47D6-BC70-8A2BF632FC17 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 22:50:57 -0400 Study helps characterize how sleep deficiency may relate to Alzheimer's pathogenesis
研究挑战创伤护理中的传统氧气实践当受伤的患者被送往医院时，应该收到多少补充氧气？科罗拉多大学医学院的调查人员领导的JAMA网络公开赛本周发表的新研究表明，这通常小于当前标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/research-challenges-traditional-oxygen-practices-in-trauma-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/research-challenges-traditional-oxygen-coxygen-practices-in-trauma-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11843dc5-11da-4B39-9519-2E0D6BCCE0AD Mon, 31 Mar 2025 22:46:15 -0400 Research challenges traditional oxygen practices in trauma care
研究表明，大多数基于植物的牛奶不满足幼儿的营养需求用大多数植物性饮料代替牛奶，除非产品加油，否则在幼儿的饮食中削减了幼儿饮食中的关键营养素。特别配制的大豆饮料可以维持甚至可以增强铁和碘的摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-reveals-most-plant--plant-m------------------------------done28099t-meet-toddlerse28099-nutrient-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-reveals-most-plant-m-------------------------------------milks-done28099t-meet-meet-toddlerse28099-nutrient-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbe6da62-b251-487a-a881-55d6259a6775 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 22:41:00 -0400 Study reveals most plant-based milks don’t meet toddlers’ nutrient needs
